version_description:
Introducing a new Bookmarks section, where you can save tweets and URLs to read later.
As opposed to Twitter Likes, bookmarks remains private and are only visible to you.

# You can now add unlimited columns on your main screen
# Added support for Split View and multitasking on iPad

- Fixed undoing likes/retweets not working in some cases
- Minor fixes for iOS 13

# Added support for iOS 13 context menus. With a touch and hold gesture you now get access to additional quick actions for images, videos, URLs and Twitter users.
# New Sepia theme
# New option to show tabs label

- Fixed keyboard partially covering text box input in DMs screen
- More results are now loaded on scroll in user search screen
- Fixed sporadic crashes on app launch

# You can now add videos to your tweets and messages
# If you are using Fenix with multiple Twitter accounts you can now choose from which to Like or Retweet a particular tweet, with a touch and hold gesture on the corresponding button.

Fixed:
- You can now correctly add images or videos when quoting a tweet.
- Fixed missing nested quoted tweets in some particular cases.
